sono Elia della ditta Auriga Srl, abbiamo acquistato l'Endpoint Protector

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000H0ZK9:ref

Hi Adrian,

the migration has been completed correctly, we keep everything monitored for
the next few days.

 

There is the options to upgrade all the clients version from the server
console or they need to do every single client?

 

Thanks for your help.

Kind regards,

Elia

 

Da: Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com> 
Inviato: mercoledì 30 ottobre 2024 12:01
A: notifiche@aurigalab.com
Oggetto: RE: Netwrix Support Ticket #423798 - - R: 00423798 - TLS non
permette accesso alla console via browser [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0H0ZK9:ref
]

 

Dear Elia,

For the migration the steps would be:
1) Importing the new appliance in VM
2) Starting the new appliance on a different IP which is available in the
customer's network
3) On the Old appliance -making sure it is at version 5940 ( its a must that
both appliances to have same server version so that the migration can be
done) - from System Maintenance > System Backup V2 - need to create a backup
and do not forget to save the Key.
4) Import the backup in the new appliance in same menu from System
Maintenance > System Backup V2.
5) Shut down the old appliance or move it on a different IP
6) Assign the old IP to the new appliance so that the already installed
clients can communicate with the new server
7) Enjoy our product! :)


Best regards,

Adrian Draghici |Technical Support Team Lead (EMEA/Asia/Aus)

Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced
Encryption

the client created a new VM with Ubuntu 22.

How much time do we need to install the EPP? Is something we can do on our

connection.

 

In one of the last email there was the following .zip:
Endpoint-Protector-5.9.4.0-Virtual-Appliance-MNL257. There is something
else the client need to download/prepare for the installation and
activation?

 

Thanks for your patience,

Elia
